objective.title: Game Objective
objective.text: The main objective is to earn points by bringing blocks containing equal numbers together and exploding them. Plan your moves strategically to create the biggest explosions!

controls.title: Game Controls
controls.text: Use left and right arrows to move the falling block. When necessary, activate addition (+) and subtraction (-) operations to modify the number in the block you land on, trying to create equal numbers.

blocks.title: Block Types
blocks.text: Blocks falling from above contain random numbers between 1-37. Prime numbers appear as blue blocks, while composite numbers appear as red blocks.

primes.title: Prime Number Bonus
primes.text: Bringing together and exploding blocks containing prime numbers grants extra points! Among prime numbers, the special number 2 provides even more bonus points.

quickDrop.title: Quick Drop
quickDrop.text: When you decide where to drop a block, instead of waiting for it to fall, you can quickly drop it using the down arrow button to speed up your gameplay.

tips.title: Pro Tips
